sentences.en: A survivor was knocked unconscious when the helicopter ditched.
sentences.cn: 在直升机紧急迫降时，一名幸存者被撞昏过去。

sentences.en: Above all Susie is a great survivor, with a bright, indomitable spirit.
sentences.cn: 总之，苏茜不畏艰难，开朗乐观、不屈不挠。

sentences.en: Being a survivor of a disaster, he began a new life.
sentences.cn: 劫后余生的他又开始了新的生活.

sentences.en: Don’t worry about Kurt; he’s a survivor.
sentences.cn: 不用担心库尔特，他是个坚强的人。

sentences.en: Exceptional patients have the ability to throw statistics aside to say, "I can be a survivor".
sentences.cn: 尽管统计数字凿凿，仍有个别病人能够做到将它抛在一边，相信自己可以活下来。

sentences.en: I think Chang is the ultimate tennis survivor, however.
sentences.cn: 我觉得张是最终的网球赢家.

sentences.en: I'm a survivor. I'll get by.
sentences.cn: 我挺过来了，我能应付下去。

sentences.en: Ishmael is the only survivor of the final confrontation with Moby Dick.
sentences.cn: 在同莫比?狄克最后的较量中,唯一的幸存者是伊希梅尔.

sentences.en: Okay , everybody, this is Rachel, another Lincoln High survivor.
sentences.cn: 各位, 她叫瑞秋, 另一位从林肯高中生存下来的人.

sentences.en: Rafferty was the sole survivor from the successful Ireland team of 1988.
sentences.cn: 拉弗蒂是1988年红极一时的爱尔兰队硕果仅存的球员。

sentences.en: The child was the single survivor of the air - crash.
sentences.cn: 这孩子是那次飞机坠毁事故的唯一幸存者.

sentences.en: The damage, however , often begins only when a survivor is extricated.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是,这种破坏恰恰是在幸存者被解救时才开始的.

sentences.en: The survivor was determined to wreaked her revenge on the murderer of her family.
sentences.cn: 这位幸存者决心要报复杀害她家人的凶手.

sentences.en: Then it is often called survivor growth.
sentences.cn: 为此,常称它为生存木生长.

sentences.en: There was only one survivor of the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 这次飞机失事中只有一名幸存者.

words.tran_cn: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长

trans.tran_cn: 幸存者，残存者，生还者，遗物，残存物，重新正常生活的人
trans.tran_en: someone who continues to live after an accident, war, or illness
